title: AI & Robotics Academy Developer

Develops hands-on projects and ensures that students gain practical experience with real-world AI and robotics systems.
achievements: Currently creating 9 units of AI and Robotics coursework (1-2 years of content) for Code Ninjas Academy
Developing educational materials for implementation across 400+ Code Ninjas locations
Creating curriculum to impact over 30,000 students in the next year
